articles.title: Facebook plans to reduce hiring as revenue growth slows and inflation concerns increase - CNBC
articles.description: Facebook's parent company is pulling back on hiring midlevel or senior-level workers as advertisers reduce spending.
articles.content:
Facebook parent Meta is slowing the pace of hiring as it reckons with its weakest revenue growth on record and ongoing business challenges, such as Apple's privacy changes and the war in Ukraine.
